00074 
00075         if (method_exists($this, "__".$action)) {
00077             return TRUE;
00078         } else {
00079             return FALSE;
00080         }

00088     private function __getMethod( $action) {
00090         if ($this->__validAction($action)) {
00091             return "__" . $action;
00092         } else {
00094             return "__viewForum";
00095         }
00096     }

00103     private function __displayContent($action) {
00104

00108         {
00109             $txtFile = home;
00110         }
00111         else {
00112             $txtFile=$this->getParam('textFile');
00113         }

00117         $fh = fopen($myFile, 'r');
00119         $theData = fread($fh, filesize($myFile));
00121         fclose($fh);
00122 //Set the temporary variable into a query string so the template file can use it
00123 
00124         $this->setVar('theData', $theData);
